experience.title: Web Developer Intern
description: Developed feature-rich web applications using JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, and Material-UI. Improved app performance by optimizing frontend integrations with Redux and REST APIs.
Collaborated with designers, backend engineers, and QA teams to align UI/UX design and application functionality with business needs, enhancing user experience and UI responsiveness.
Delivered code and updates via Git and GitHub, and utilized Postman for API testing, ensuring smooth integration of RESTful APIs.
Focused on clean architecture, ensuring separation of concerns and reducing app complexity through the effective use of modern tools and technologies like Visual Studio Code.
